code: import{createEvent}from'effector';import{fetchAllChatList,fetchChatAllGroup,fetchChatAllOrg,fetchChatAllUser,fetchGroupChats,fetchSentMessage,fetchUpdateMessage,fetchUserDetailChat}from'./effects';export var allChatsMount=createEvent();export var groupChatsMount=createEvent();export var chatAllOrgMount=createEvent();export var temporaryMessageMount=createEvent();export var chatForceLoading=createEvent();export var chatAllUserMount=createEvent();export var chatAllGroupMount=createEvent();export var createMessageEvent=createEvent();export var updateMessageEvent=createEvent();export var removeMessageEvent=createEvent();export var userChatDetailMount=createEvent();export var userSentMessageMount=createEvent();export var userUpdateMessageMount=createEvent();export var updateChatFromSocket=createEvent();export var chatSocketActionsMount=createEvent();export var addedMessageFromSocket=createEvent();export var updateCounterFromSocket=createEvent();export var addedMessageToListFromSocket=createEvent();export var userMessageUploadProgress=createEvent();allChatsMount.watch(fetchAllChatList);groupChatsMount.watch(fetchGroupChats);chatAllOrgMount.watch(fetchChatAllOrg);chatAllUserMount.watch(fetchChatAllUser);chatAllGroupMount.watch(fetchChatAllGroup);userSentMessageMount.watch(fetchSentMessage);userChatDetailMount.watch(fetchUserDetailChat);userUpdateMessageMount.watch(fetchUpdateMessage);
